name: Desktop Viking
description:
During the year 2XXX, the world is in lockdown and those who have family or friends are distanced. The world is different and the rules have changed for the safety of many. But for one person, they work at home every day, making sure code is in line and works with the over fundamentals for the project.

Viking posters and such surrounds his room. A clear sign of being a fan of North mythology, he sits in his room pondering of what to do next, yet the silent humming of the computer turns him to focus on his imagination for the rest of the night.

And now what he dreams is up to you
